name: Rewind Puzzle
description:
PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW

w,a,s,d to move the character.

The objective of the game is to undo the actions carried out until reaching the initial state of the game. The initial state consists of the red spell, all life, 0 money, and all enemies with all life. To do this, you have to move the player with the keys w, a, s, d and interact with the nearby characters using the mouse.
The game runs in reverse! Where attacking the enemies will give them health because you are reversing the actions. Using potions takes away health, selling objects will make you obtain them and buy them lose them.

To use the shop:
This means you can acquire and object and lose the money. ( You sold that object.)

This means that you bought the item and now you lose it. You earn money and lose the object.

In the UI these icons show the value of the objects.

You can acquire a potion as long as you have enough life. This is the same as undoing you drank a potion.

Spells power:

     Red -> 100% health
     Blue -> 50% health
     Yellow -> 25% health 

Potion restores 25% health.
Enemy cause a damage of 25% health.

Poner en pantalla completa.

w,a,s,d para moverse.

El objetivo del juego es deshacer las acciones realizadas hasta llegar al estado inicial del juego. El estado inicial se compone del hechizo rojo, toda la vida, 0 de dinero y todos los enemigos con toda la vida. Para ello hay que desplazar al jugador con las teclas w,a,s,d e interactuar con los personajes cercanos utilizando el raton.
